name: technobiogenesis
description:
the search for the hyperreal image — the perfect dataset—

new lifeforms in the silica the optic fiber the cloud

a manufactured cosmic horror. the hyperreality collapses under its own weight with the fervor of the cambrian explosion

tecnobiogenesis is my bachelor's thesis, a small simulation of a fictional space, built with synthetic generative images (aka "AI art"). read more about it here (offline mirror also downloadable).

warning for flashing images.

image generators used:
  • glide clip-conditioned text2im, by ai_curio  
  • simple stable, by ai_curio
  • artbreeder, by joel simon  
  • ai art machine, by hillel wayne
